content: make yourself a dazzling summer shopper bag 1 this is a perfect everyday bag for your trips to the market or to the beach the bag is worked in go handmades cosy yarn 2 consisting of 60% cotton and 40% acrylic the acrylic ensures that the bag keeps its shape and wont stretch like pure cotton would do the bag is worked in a simple but pretty pattern have fun **materials ** − crochet hook 5 mm us size h/8 − go handmade cosy − stitch markers **measurements ** measure while lying flat approx 35 cm wide approx 39 cm deep and 68 cm long including strap **usage ** approx 225 g 5 balls **abbreviations ** **chain** chain stitch **magic_ring** magic_ring **st** stitch / stitches **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **single_crochet** double_crochet **hdc2tog** half double decrease 1 half_double_crochet over 2 half_double_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch 1 https //hobbii com/product-patterns/summer-shopper utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=sommer-shopper&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/cosy-go-handmade utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=cosy-gohandmade&utm_term=swr
